positions.descripcion: REST API development with Spring Boot, SAP JCo and SOAP/WSDL integrations, optimization with MyBatis and Redis. Frontend with Angular 17 and PrimeNG, mobile apps with Apache Cordova.
Enterprise systems development with Spring Boot, Angular 14, MyBatis + Oracle, and hybrid app generation with Apache Cordova.
Backend with Spring Boot, JPA and Lombok. Microservices for orders, inventory and logistics. Firebase integration for real-time notifications.
Inventory and construction management system. Backend and frontend development with Angular 11, MariaDB and SQL Server databases.
Web platform development with HTML5, CSS and JavaScript. Online radio streaming implementation.
